MESSAGE.Translation: She looked down bashfully.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あったほうがいいよーな気もしますし、でもこんなのはすこし予想外で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...maybe it'd be great. But your offer is kind of unexpected.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We have to follow the dorm rules and, and before that, I mean, er...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あの、直枝さんにはっ…すてきなひとがいっぱいですしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um, and I think there are lots of nice girls around you, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Even so, if we could share a room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは両手をぱたぱたと振り回して、あるいは上にやったり下にやったり忙しなく動かした。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud gestured wildly with both hands, up, down, left, right, center; each new gesture more hurried than the last.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...maybe it'd be great. But your offer is kind of unexpected.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか水飲み鳥のオモチャっぽい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like watching one of those water-drinking toy birds.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um, and I think there are lots of nice girls around you, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちょっと待てぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait a sec...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud gestured wildly with both hands, up, down, left, right, center; each new gesture more hurried than the last.

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を伏せていた真人が静かに言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato, who had lowered his head, said quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like watching one of those water-drinking toy birds.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こいつはちぃとキツイぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This is kinda cruel...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait a sec...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それって…オレが理樹に嫌われちまったってことじゃねぇか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, what you said means... you hate me, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato, who had lowered his head, said quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: うわ、真人が傷ついている!!
MESSAGE.EN: Whoops, it seems like I've hurt him!!
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This is kinda cruel...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな、真人から逃げようとかそういうわけじゃなく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it doesn't. It's not like I want to get away from you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, what you said means... you hate me, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「筋肉が足らなかったか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't have enough muscles to satisfy you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Whoops, it seems like I've hurt him!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「むしろ逆だし…落ち着いてよ、ね。僕はどこにもいかないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You do... Calm down, okay? I'm not going anywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it doesn't. It's not like I want to get away from you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ならいいが…オレの心はナイーブなんだぜ、覚えておいてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay... But just remember I have a naive mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't have enough muscles to satisfy you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「むしろそっちを鍛えてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe you should train your mind instead of your body...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You do... Calm down, okay? I'm not going anywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: というか、もとを正せば、僕がおかしな発言をしたからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking back, it was my fault for saying something weird to begin with.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay... But just remember I have a naive mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe you should train your mind instead of your body...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは真っ白い耳まで真っ赤にして俯いてしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was still looking at the floor; she was red to her ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking back, it was my fault for saying something weird to begin with.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド、ごめん、冗談、ジョーク、いっつあじょーく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, sorry, just kidding. Joke, ittsu a jouku.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu～...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Eh, ah...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was still looking at the floor; she was red to her ears.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, sorry, just kidding. Joke, ittsu a jouku.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはぴょん！と飛びあがらんばかりに顔を上げ目を見開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted her head, opening her eyes widely as if she was about to jump into the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Eh, ah...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「じょ、ジョークですか、あ、なるほど、はい、えーと、これがアメリカンなわけですね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Jo, jouku? Oh I see. Yes, well, it's an American joke, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやアメリカンというわけじゃないけど、冗談だよ、冗談」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not American. It's just a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted her head, opening her eyes widely as if she was about to jump into the air.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Jo, jouku? Oh I see. Yes, well, it's an American joke, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「い、いえ。その、そうですよね、うん、びっくりしました…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝N, no, that, that's right... yes, that was just such a surprise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not American. It's just a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドは胸に手を当てて、ほぅ、と息をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hand to her chest, heaving a sigh of relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「びっくりしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That took me by surprise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝N, no, that, that's right... yes, that was just such a surprise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、それはわかったから。ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know. I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hand to her chest, heaving a sigh of relief.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いえ。びっくりしただけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I was just so surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That took me by surprise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドはにっこり笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud beamed a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know. I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それで、誰がいいでしょうかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, who do you think would be best to ask?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I was just so surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はどうだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What about Rin?
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud beamed a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, who do you think would be best to ask?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 考えただけでも難しそうだけど、やってみる価値はあるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: That might be worth trying, but it's difficult just thinking about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: What about Rin?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の人見知りは筋金入りだからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Because Rin's shy to the bone...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どうしましたかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What's on your mind?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: That might be worth trying, but it's difficult just thinking about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、鈴はどうかと思ったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, well I was wondering whether it'd work out with Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Because Rin's shy to the bone...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鈴さんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rin-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What's on your mind?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「前にご一緒したときは、全然お話が出来なかったのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝When we used to share a room, we didn't talk even once...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, well I was wondering whether it'd work out with Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうか。最初は臨時的に鈴の部屋にクドは厄介になっていたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It reminded me that Kud had temporarily stayed in Rin's room before.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rin-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その鈴が校内を案内するはずだったのに、結局僕と一緒に案内して、そして案の定、僕しかクドと話さなかったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin had been supposed to give Kud a guided tour of the school, but I ended up playing that role. Besides that, Rin, just as I suspected, hadn't made any conversation with Kud at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝When we used to share a room, we didn't talk even once...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「今度は仲良くしてくれるでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Do you think we could become good friends this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: It reminded me that Kud had temporarily stayed in Rin's room before.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、じゃあちょっと訊いてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's go ask her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin had been supposed to give Kud a guided tour of the school, but I ended up playing that role. Besides that, Rin, just as I suspected, hadn't made any conversation with Kud at all.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝OK!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Do you think we could become good friends this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …もしかしたら、クドの人懐っこさなら何とかなるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud's sincerity might be able to give them a fresh start.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, let's go ask her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いや、やっぱりあんまり期待しないでいこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, we should probably keep our expectations realistic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝OK!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「は、はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝H-huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud's sincerity might be able to give them a fresh start.

MESSAGE.JP: 渡り廊下に移動すると、相変らず鈴が猫に囲まれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When we reached the connecting corridor, we found Rin surrounded by a horde of cats as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, we should probably keep our expectations realistic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow?
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝H-huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ちょっと待ってろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait a moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: When we reached the connecting corridor, we found Rin surrounded by a horde of cats as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃーにゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「待ってろ…というか、待てっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Just wait... No, stop it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait a moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふひゃ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fhya!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow meow.

MESSAGE.JP: えり首にはまりそうになった猫を慌てて摘み出す鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin hastily grabbed a cat that was trying to sneak under her collar shirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Just wait... No, stop it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ちょっと待っ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wait a mi...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fhya!❞

MESSAGE.JP: わらわらわら。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bustle*bustle*.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin hastily grabbed a cat that was trying to sneak under her collar shirt.

MESSAGE.JP: 払いのけられる遊びと勘違いしたのか猫たちが集まってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Misunderstanding Rin's actions, probably thinking she was going to groom them, the other cats gathered around her.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait a mi...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…こら、髪の毛ひっぱるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Hey, don't pull my hair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bustle*bustle*.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の手元を見ると麻紐を弄っているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed she was doing something with a hemp string.
MESSAGE.Translation: Misunderstanding Rin's actions, probably thinking she was going to groom them, the other cats gathered around her.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ひっぱるなっ！　ほらっ、できたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't pull it! Here, it's done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Hey, don't pull my hair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺしぺし。麻紐が地面を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: *Swoosh*swoosh*. She whipped the ground with the string.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed she was doing something with a hemp string.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃ！　にゃにゃっ！
MESSAGE.EN: Meow! Meow meow!
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't pull it! Here, it's done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫たちの視線が一斉に紐に向く。
MESSAGE.EN: All the cats were watching the string.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Swoosh*swoosh*. She whipped the ground with the string.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「自信作だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is my masterpiece.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow! Meow meow!

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がうねうねと紐を動かす度に猫たちは大喜びで飛びつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time she moved the string, the cats were trying to catch it with great delight.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the cats were watching the string.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うんうん。たのしーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Good, I'm glad you guys are enjoying this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is my masterpiece.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしもたのしーぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's fun for me too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time she moved the string, the cats were trying to catch it with great delight.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こっちにも一本あったりする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Look, I have another one here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Good, I'm glad you guys are enjoying this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「たのしさ倍増だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝With this it's twice the fun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's fun for me too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かさかさ。
MESSAGE.EN: She brought out another string.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Look, I have another one here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 音が違うと思ったら梱包に使うプラスティックテープだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Noticing it make a different sound this time, I could see that it was made of duct tape.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝With this it's twice the fun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃにゃぅー！
MESSAGE.EN: Meow, meow!
MESSAGE.Translation: She brought out another string.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ほれほれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Catch, catch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Noticing it make a different sound this time, I could see that it was made of duct tape.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー！
MESSAGE.EN: Meow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow, meow!

MESSAGE.JP: 動く紐に興奮しきったのか鈴の肩に飛び乗って狙う猫も現われた。
MESSAGE.EN: A few of the cats went crazy for it, jumping onto her shoulders in order to catch it.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Catch, catch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わらわら。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, the other cats followed suit.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「って、重っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're too heavy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: A few of the cats went crazy for it, jumping onto her shoulders in order to catch it.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃにゃー！
MESSAGE.EN: Meow meow!
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, the other cats followed suit.

MESSAGE.JP: 紐が止まっているにもかかわらず猫たちは鈴の背中を目指す。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she'd already stopped playing with the strings, cats were still climbing her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're too heavy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そしておまえたちは紐はどーでもよくなってるだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You guys don't care about the strings anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow meow!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「たのしそーだからいーけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But that's okay. You guys seem to be having fun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she'd already stopped playing with the strings, cats were still climbing her back.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はくすくす笑っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She giggled a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You guys don't care about the strings anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そろそろ声をかけよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should call out to her soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But that's okay. You guys seem to be having fun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「機嫌はよさそうだよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, she looks happy now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She giggled a little.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「早速ご挨拶なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's say hello, then!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I should call out to her soon.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, she looks happy now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「早速ご挨拶なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's say hi!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's say hello, then!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕よりも早く駆けだしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd already started running.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's say hi!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ!!　こんにちはなのですーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu-!! Good afternoon to you!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぱたぱたと走っていくと。
MESSAGE.EN: She started running toward Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd already started running.
`Kud@❝Wafu-!! Good afternoon to you!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: だーーっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Scramble*――!!
MESSAGE.Translation: She started running toward Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 周りの猫と一緒に物陰に隠れてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and the cats scurried into hiding.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いきなりで驚かせちゃったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You took her by surprise...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: *Scramble*――!!

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わ、わふー、警戒されてますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu-, did I scare her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and the cats scurried into hiding.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、まあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, probably...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You took her by surprise...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず僕が鈴を連れ戻してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I brought Rin to Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wa, wafu-, did I scare her?❞
`Riki@❝Yeah, probably...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっきのせいか、鈴は僕の後ろにしがみついたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She hid behind me, clinging to my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I brought Rin to Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「鈴さん、こんにちはなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rin-san, good afternoon to you.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: She hid behind me, clinging to my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は後ろに隠れたままでこくこくと頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin nodded twice, still hiding behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rin-san, good afternoon to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...O, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin nodded twice, still hiding behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと顔を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She poked her head out.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こんにちは、ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Good afternoon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...O, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん…こんにち…は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah... Good after... noon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She poked her head out.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Good afternoon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何とか挨拶は出来たようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin could manage to greet back.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah... Good after... noon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それでさ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドが今ルームメイトを探してるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud is looking for a roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin could manage to greet back.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ルームメイト？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Roommate?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ、一緒のお部屋で生活するのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, I'd like someone to live with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud is looking for a roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにぃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Roommate?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「最初、そうしてたでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You lived with Kud before, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, I'd like someone to live with.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歯切れの悪い返事。あまりいい思い出ではなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a noncommittal response. Seems like those weren't very fond memories for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You lived with Kud before, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり鈴の性格ではダメか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe it was impossible after all, given Rin's personality...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やっぱり無理そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess it won't work...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a noncommittal response. Seems like those weren't very fond memories for her.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、おまえがやればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, you do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe it was impossible after all, given Rin's personality...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ダメだよ。僕は男だから女子寮入れないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't. I'm not allowed to live in the girls' dorm because I'm a guy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess it won't work...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, you do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 追いつめられたように頭を抱え出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her hands on her head as if she were at a loss.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't. I'm not allowed to live in the girls' dorm because I'm a guy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…鈴さん、ダメならしょうがないのですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Rin-san, it can't be helped, you don't have to force yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「悩んでくれただけでも、私は嬉しいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm just glad you gave it some thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her hands on her head as if she were at a loss.
`Kud@❝...Rin-san, it can't be helped, you don't have to force yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「でも、もう少しだけ仲良くしてくれると、もっと嬉しいのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's just that it would be great if we could become better friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm just glad you gave it some thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は、クドのほうをみると。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin glanced at Kud,
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's just that it would be great if we could become better friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつ、ちりんと頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: and nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin glanced at Kud,

MESSAGE.JP: …クドもそれで嬉しそうな顔をした。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kud was satisfied with Rin's reaction and smiled happily.
MESSAGE.Translation: and nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、もしかしたらって思ったんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry. I thought it was going to work out better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いえいえ、仕方がないのです。誰にだって都合や事情はあります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, you don't have to apologize. Everyone has their own problems to deal with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kud was satisfied with Rin's reaction and smiled happily.

MESSAGE.JP: クドはそういうが、ちょっと寂しそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She may have said so, but she still looked a little sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry. I thought it was going to work out better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「今回はダメでしたが、次はがんばるのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This time was a failure, but I'll do better next time!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, you don't have to apologize. Everyone has their own problems to deal with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ふぁいと、おーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Fight! Ohhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She may have said so, but she still looked a little sad.

MESSAGE.JP: すぐにやる気になる。
MESSAGE.EN: She got motivated quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This time was a failure, but I'll do better next time!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…僕もがんばらないとなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...I should put some effort in as well.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Fight! Ohhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、何とかしてあげたいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I resolved once again to find some way to help her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got motivated quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんとか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about Komari-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...I should put some effort in as well.)

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はあ、小毬さんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Komari-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I resolved once again to find some way to help her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、小毬さんなら喜んで引き受けてくれると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think she'd welcome your offer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですね、今度の休み時間にでも聞いてみましょうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay. Let's ask her next break.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …というわけで休み時間。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Break time.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I think she'd welcome your offer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Where is she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay. Let's ask her next break.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室にはすでに小毬さんの姿はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san had already vanished from the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Break time.

MESSAGE.JP: あの人、結構落ち着きなく動き回るからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Quite a spirited one, that girl...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Where is she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どうしましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What are we going to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san had already vanished from the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、自販機にでも行ってみようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go get a couple of soft drinks from the vending machine out in the courtyard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Quite a spirited one, that girl...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「中庭に行ってるとしたら、途中で会うかもしれないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We might bump into her out there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What are we going to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わかりましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go get a couple of soft drinks from the vending machine out in the courtyard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二人で裏庭に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: We headed for the backyard first.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We might bump into her out there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はあー、裏庭は結構好きだったりします。森林浴ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I love this place, it's so relaxing walking here and breathing in the forest air.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、僕もここは結構好きかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, so do I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: We headed for the backyard first.

MESSAGE.JP: 木々の合間にある歩道を並んで歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: We walked along the pathway lined with trees.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I love this place, it's so relaxing walking here and breathing in the forest air.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その緑の隙間から、快晴の空を見上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Between the gaps we could see the brilliantly sunny sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, so do I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …この天気なら、小毬さんが外をうろついていそうな気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I bet Komari-san's outside now since she enjoys nice weather...
MESSAGE.Translation: We walked along the pathway lined with trees.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Between the gaps we could see the brilliantly sunny sky.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いました、小毬さんですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Look, it's Komari-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I bet Komari-san's outside now since she enjoys nice weather...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、やっぱり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, just as I thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クドの指差す方向をみると、小毬さんがなにやら校舎の方を見上げているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned my eyes in the direction Kud was pointing and found Komari-san gazing up at the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Look, it's Komari-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何してんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's she doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, just as I thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「さ、さあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned my eyes in the direction Kud was pointing and found Komari-san gazing up at the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず声掛けてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's try talking to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's she doing?❞
`Kud@❝I don't know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんは余程夢中になっているのか、僕らが近付いていっても気付く気配すらない。
MESSAGE.EN: She was so lost in thought that she didn't seem to notice as we approached.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's try talking to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…小毬さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She was so lost in thought that she didn't seem to notice as we approached.

MESSAGE.JP: びく、と反応して振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: She was startled and turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Komari-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ…な、なんだ、理樹君かぁ…びっくりしたよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh... What, it's you, Riki-kun... You really caught me off guard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや別にびっくりさせるつもりはなかったんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wasn't trying to surprise you, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She was startled and turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おーこまーりーほわっつはぷん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, Koma-ri-, howattsu hapun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh... What, it's you, Riki-kun... You really caught me off guard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　大困り？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? Ookomari?❞ (Big problem.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wasn't trying to surprise you, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いえす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Iesu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, Koma-ri-, howattsu hapun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…たぶんそれは、ちがう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I think she meant something else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? Ookomari?❞ (Big problem.)

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「だいじょうぶだよ、クーちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's okay, Kuu-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Iesu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽん、と肩を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: She clapped Kud on the shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I think she meant something else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「大丈夫ですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's okay, Kuu-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、ちょっと困ることがあっても、きっとだいじょうぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yup. Even if you've got a bit of a problem, I'm sure everything will work out fine in the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She clapped Kud on the shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですね、大丈夫ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, you're right. It'll be okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「通じてないのに会話って成り立つもんなんだねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Although they're misunderstanding each other, it's going smoothly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yup. Even if you've got a bit of a problem, I'm sure everything will work out fine in the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それでこまーりーさんは何をしていたんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So, what are you doing here, Koma-ri-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, you're right. It'll be okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、ほら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well, you see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Although they're misunderstanding each other, it's going smoothly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが校舎の壁の片隅を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed to a corner of the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So, what are you doing here, Koma-ri-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ツバメの巣だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A bird's nest.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well, you see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 眺めていると、ひょい、と一匹のツバメが顔を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: A swallow peeked out its head as we looked.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed to a corner of the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: すると、どこからかもう一匹のツバメが飛んできて、その巣に留まった。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, another swallow swooped down and landed in the nest.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A bird's nest.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はうぁっ、むちゃんこ可愛いですーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hau～, they're so cute～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: A swallow peeked out its head as we looked.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「一匹だけね、まだ飛べなくて残ってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝There's one swallow that can't fly yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, another swallow swooped down and landed in the nest.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…他のみんなは、もうびゅんびゅん飛び回ってるのにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...All the others are already out flying around, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hau～, they're so cute～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「お母さんが残ってるけど、どうしても飛べないみたいなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mama swallow stays with it but it still doesn't seem able to fly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝There's one swallow that can't fly yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...All the others are already out flying around, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それは可哀想です…このままじゃ、あのツバメさん残されていってしまいますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I feel sorry for it... At this rate it might end up the only one left in the nest!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mama swallow stays with it but it still doesn't seem able to fly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、だからたまにここに来て応援してるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep. I'm here to cheer it on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さんらしいな、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's so like her.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I feel sorry for it... At this rate it might end up the only one left in the nest!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ふぁいとですーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Fight!❞
